column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////On a day trip with some friends
column2: we found this place because they had a gluten-free
column4: which was a necessity for one of my friends. The other 4 of us ordered a large deep dish pepperoni pizza
column5: and it was so delicious that we all devoured our 2 slices in minutes. Mike
column8: too. You could tell he loved talking shop with patrons
column9: and he even gave us a free dessert. I highly recommend Lou's!
